docs.title: Logi-Slate UI
docs.text:
The tactical command center for competitive Warhammer 40k.

A modern React/TypeScript interface for army management, match tracking, and meta analysis.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Premium Design — Dark mode, glassmorphism, micro-animations
  • Mobile-First — Touch-optimized for tablets
  • Real-Time — Live updates during matches

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
git clone https://github.com/vindicta-platform/Logi-Slate-UI.git
cd Logi-Slate-UI
npm install
npm run dev

Open http://localhost:3000

docs.title: ADR-001: TypeScript as Primary Language
docs.text: Status: Accepted Date: 2026-02-01

docs.title: Context
docs.text: This repository requires a programming language for implementation. It is a React-based frontend application.

docs.title: Decision
docs.text: We adopt TypeScript 5+ as the primary language.

docs.title: Rationale
docs.text:
• UI Layer — React/TypeScript is standard for web frontends
  • Type Safety — Compile-time type checking
  • React Ecosystem — Full community support

docs.title: Alternatives Considered
docs.text: Alternative Pros Cons Decision Python Platform consistency Not suitable for web UI Rejected JavaScript No build step No type safety Rejected Rust/WASM Performance Overkill for this use case Rejected

docs.title: Consequences
docs.text:
• All source code uses TypeScript 5+
  • Strict TypeScript config enabled
  • ESLint + Prettier for linting/formatting

docs.title: ADR-002: Pre-commit Hooks Required
docs.text: Status: Accepted Date: 2026-02-01

docs.title: Context
docs.text: Code quality requires enforcement before commits.

docs.title: Decision
docs.text: All repositories MUST configure pre-commit hooks using Husky.

docs.title: Required Hooks
docs.text:
{
  "lint-staged": {
    "*.{ts,tsx}": ["eslint --fix", "prettier --write"]
  }
}

docs.title: Alternatives Considered
docs.text: Alternative Pros Cons Decision pre-commit (Python) Cross-platform Different ecosystem Rejected CI-only Simpler setup Late feedback Rejected

docs.title: Consequences
docs.text:
• Husky + lint-staged installed
  • Developers must run npm install after clone
